messages.content: What is the version of ComfyUI zfkun after the 2024-01-21 update?
The version of ComfyUI zfkun after the 2024-01-21 update is 0.0.8.
What features were added to the Share Screen node during the 2024-01-06 update?
During the 2024-01-06 update, error tips were added for the Share Screen node, and Clip Area and Refresh Duration support were added.
What is the initial version of the Share Screen node?
The initial version of the Share Screen node is 0.0.6, as indicated by the 2023-12-24 update in the ChangeLog.
How can one install ComfyUI zfkun?

ComfyUI zfkun can be installed by first installing ComfyUI Manager and following the steps introduced there to install this repo, or by cloning the repo into the ComfyUI/custom_nodes/ directory and running pip install -r requirements.txt.
What platforms are supported by the Text Translation node?
The Text Translation node supports translating text using the platforms baidu, alibaba, tencent, volcengine, and niutrans.
What is the Camera Capture Simple server used for?
The Camera Capture Simple server is mainly used with `Load Image Path` and `LCM` for real-time virtual live workflow.
What does Load Image Path node support for output image format?
The Load Image Path node supports `RGBA` for output image format.
What are the features of the Share Screen node?
The Share Screen node features support for window, tab, screen sharing, multiple share nodes at the same time, custom clip area, custom refresh duration, and a default image in RGBA format.
What is the purpose of the Window Capture Simple server?
The Window Capture Simple server has a purpose of capturing window for **real-time virtual live** workflow, it is marked as WIP (Work In Progress).
